thread.title: Bank Deregulation Bill Clears Congress

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Bank Deregulation Bill Clears Congress
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Congress took a big step Tuesday to relax a wave of crisis-era restrictions placed on financial firms, as the House approved a plan to ease rules for small and midsize banks.
The House voted 258-159 to approve the most significant bipartisan revamp of financial rules since Republicans took control of government last year. Thirty-three Democrats sided with Republicans to pass the bill.
The...
